Functions

low level function between dual-pob and dual-pob servomotor.
you don't have to call this function in your user code!

void InitDualServoBus (void)
 Init dual-pob servo communication.
void WriteByteToDualServo (UInt8 data)

Detailed Description

DUAL-POB servomotor function.

Function to manage servomotor and motors of the dual-pob servo board.

dual-pob servo features:

  • 18 servomotors.
  • 1 internal pwm for the 2 DC motors.
  • 1 connector for 2 DC motors.

Servo example
        UInt8 position,speed;
        UInt8 array[2];

        InitUART0(19200);
        
        InitDualServo();

        SendString("dual-pob servo test\r\n");


        SetServo(5,1,1);

        Wait_Ms(1000);

        SetServo(5,254,1);

void SetDCSpeed ( UInt8  speed  ) 

Set speed of DC motors.

This function calls SetPwm() to set the speed. If you want control the speed with more parameters, use the SetPwm().

Parameters:
speed DC motors speed (between 0 and 35)

void SetGlobalSpeed ( UInt8  speed  )

Parameters:
speed speed for all servomotor

void SetPwm ( UInt8  period,
UInt16  dutycycle,
PwmPrescaler  prescaler 
)

Set pwm of DC motors.

The PWM period and PWM duty cycle formula:

PWM Period = (PWM period configuration byte +1 ) x 4 x (1 / CPU Frequency) x (PWM prescaler) with CPU Frequency at 20MHz

PWM Duty cycle = (Duty cycle configuration byte + 256 ) x (1 / CPU Frequency) x (PWM prescaler) with CPU Frequency at 20MHz

You can compute the period and dutycycle parameters for this function with this formula:

period byte = ( PWM Period x CPU Frequency ) / ( prescaler x 4 ) - 1

dutyclycle word = ( PWM Dutycycle x 4 x CPU Frequency ) / ( prescaler ) - 256

With CPU Frequency = 20 MHz and PWM Period and PWM Dutycycle in seconds.

Warning:
Hardware don't support frequencies higher than 5 KHz.
Parameters:
period PWM period configuration (previous formula to compute this byte)
dutycycle Duty cycle configuration (previous formula to compute this byte)
prescaler PWM prescaler value: 1, 4 or 16

void SetPwmToDefault ( void   ) 

Set default value for pwm.

Period = 0xFF, Dutycycle = 650 and Prescaler = 16.

UInt8  position,
UInt8  speed 
)

servo servomotor identifier : between 0 to 17
position servomotor position
speed servomotor speed : between 0 to 7.

void SetServoArray ( UInt8 *  position,
UInt8 *  speed,
UInt8  offset,
UInt8  len 
)

Set position and speed of multiple servomotor. 

        UInt8 position[4];
        UInt8 speed[4];

        // init position and speed array....
        position[0] = 0;
        position[1] = 0;
        position[2] = 0;
        position[3] = 0;

        speed[0]=1;
        speed[1]=1;
        speed[2]=1;
        speed[3]=1;

        // set servos 2,3,4 and 5 with the position and speed array:

        SetServoArray(position, speed, 2, 4 );

Parameters:
position Array of position
speed Array of speed
offset Identifier of the first servomotor which have to be set.
len Lenght of position's array and speed's array.

void SetServoPosition ( UInt8 *  position,
UInt8  offset,
UInt8  len 
)

Set position of multiple servomotor. 

        UInt8 position[4];

        // init position array....
        position[0] = 100;
        position[1] = 100;
        position[2] = 100;
        position[3] = 100;

        // set servos 2,3,4 and 5 with the position array:

        SetServoArray(position, 2, 4 );

Parameters:
position Array of position
offset Identifier of the first servomotor which have to be set.
len Lenght of position's array.
